title: When is Diwali 2025 being celebrated across India, on October 20 or 21?
description: Diwali 2025 is on October 20. The Amavasya Tithi begins on October 20 and ends on October 21. Lakshmi Puja is scheduled between 7:08 PM and 8:18 PM. This festival signifies the victory of light over darkness. Homes will be decorated, and families will gather to celebrate prosperity and togetherness. The festival emphasizes renewal and gratitude.

title: Watch: Mahatma Gandhi’s method remains profoundly relevant today, says Bhikhu Parekh
description: From a small town in Gujarat to the House of Lords in London, Bhikhu Parekh’s journey has been one of intellect, conviction, and humility. He helped shape modern debates on multiculturalism, identity, and democracy. His critical reading of Mahatma Gandhi drew wide attention, and in 2007, India honoured him with the Padma Bhushan. Mehul Devkala met Lord Parekh for an unhurried conversation that moved from geopolitics and immigration to Gandhi’s legacy, Indian democracy, and the meaning of a good life.

Why Bihar’s education system needs to be on the ballot this election
description: As Bihar heads into its two-phase Assembly elections, its worsening education crisis draws urgent attention. Dropout rates at all levels—primary, secondary, and higher secondary—are among the highest in India. According to India Data Map and Counterview, teacher shortages, school closures, and poor literacy outcomes are reinforcing inequality. With over 7.43 crore voters participating, the election offers a crucial chance to make education reform a core issue shaping the state's future.

title: Backlash over Bad Bunny's 2026 Super Bowl Show turns into opportunity

He was also honored as Top Latin Artist of the 21st Century at the 2025 Billboard Latin Music Awards.

title: Microsoft engineer quits after 13 years; sends resignation email to employees
description: A principal software engineer at Microsoft resigned, citing the company's cloud services contracts with the Israeli military. This follows months of internal dissent and the firing of five employees over Gaza-related protests. While Microsoft cut some services to an Israeli intelligence unit, activists argue it's insufficient.
